about-me.subtitle: Let's collaborate and build something remarkable together!
about-me.text: Hi there! I'm Caryen, a frontend developer passionate about creating intuitive and efficient digital experiences. With a natural problem-solving mindset and a keen eye for detail, I specialize in transforming complex concepts into visually appealing and functional web solutions.

my-stack.headline: MY STACK
my-stack.title: Skill set
my-stack.text: I have gained experience in building projects with a variety of frontend technologies and concepts. With a strong growth mindset, I'm always exploring new areas to enhance my skill set.

projects.headline: MY CRAFT
projects.title: Projects
projects.text: In my projects, I focus on creating user-friendly and responsive solutions that are both functional and visually appealing. Each project is built on efficient and clean code to optimize performance and ensure a seamless user experience. Take a look at some of my work and see for yourself the quality and creativity I bring to every project.
projects.join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
projects.game: An action-packed jump, run, slash, and throw game with an object-oriented approach
projects.pokedex: An interactive Pokédex web app that fetches Pokémon data via an API, allowing users to search and explore Pokémon details easily.

colleagues.headline: IN THEIR WORDS:
colleagues.title: Colleagues' Thoughts
colleagues.card1: I have experienced Caryen as an extremely diligent, highly committed, and exceptionally capable team member who enjoys tackling complex solutions. She works in a very structured manner, has an exceptionally quick grasp of new concepts, and thinks far beyond the scope of her assigned tasks. She always maintains an overview, even of details that might otherwise be overlooked. Thanks to her efforts, the time required for our project was significantly reduced. I would gladly work with her again at any time.
colleagues.card2: It was a pleasure to work with Caryen...
colleagues.card3: Caryen was a great team colleague...

contactFrom.headline: CONTACT ME
contactFrom.title: Ready to work together?
contactFrom.text: I look forward to hearing from you! If you're looking for a dedicated and passionate frontend developer who can bring real value to your team with expertise and enthusiasm, let's definitely get in touch.
contactFrom.text2: I'm committed to improving my skills and delivering innovative solutions that enhance the user experience. Whether for new projects or existing ones, I'm ready to contribute to your team's success.
contactFrom.subline: Let's work together and create something great! I'm excited to share more about my experience and skills to show how I can contribute to your team.
contactFrom.name: What's your name?
contactFrom.help-input: Hello Caryen, I am interested in...
contactFrom.policy: I've read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
contactFrom.name-f: Oops! it seems your name is missing
contactFrom.help-f: What do you neet to develop?

join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
join.details: Short text that describes your role or the workflow for this specific project. Let a recruiter know more about your knowledge and ability to work independently or collaboratively in a structured way.
join.headline: Description

game.description: An action-packed jump, run, slash, and throw game with an object-oriented approach. You are the last survivor of humanity, searching for the poison that can defeat the insane zombies. Wield your sword to cut through hordes of enemies or use the poison bottle to eliminate them for good. But stay alert—countless obstacles and dangers await. Stay sharp, fight bravely, and survive!
game.details: Developed a 2D action-platformer in JavaScript. Implemented character movement, combat, enemy AI, collision detection, and physics. Ensured maintainability, performance optimization, and cross-browser compatibility.
game.headline: Description

pokedex.description: An interactive Pokédex with API integration for searching and viewing Pokémon details. Users can filter by starting letters. Optimized for all devices.
pokedex.details: The project was developed using JavaScript and the Fetch API to retrieve Pokémon data in real-time from an external interface. Asynchronous functions were implemented to ensure smooth data processing. The search functionality utilizes string methods to efficiently filter Pokémon names. Special focus was placed on a structured code architecture, responsive design for different screen sizes, and optimizing API requests for fast loading times.
pokedex.headline: Description

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: Your privacy is important to us. It is our policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website, www.caryen-song.com, and other sites we own and operate.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.content: We only collect information about you if we have a reason to do so – for example, to provide our services, to communicate with you, or to make our services better. We collect information in three ways: if and when you provide information to us, automatically through operating our services, and from outside sources.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Information
section2.intro: We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:
list: Provide, operate, and maintain our website
Improve, personalize, and expand our website
Understand and analyze how you use our website
Develop new products, services, features, and functionality

Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the website, and for marketing and promotional purposes

section3.title: 3. Sharing Information
section3.content: We do not share your personal information publicly or with third parties except when required to by law.

section4.title: 4. Data Retention
section4.content: We will retain your personal information only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use your information to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our policies.

section5.title: 5. Your Data Protection Rights
section5.intro: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:
list: The right to access – You have the right to request copies of your personal data.
The right to rectification – You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate or complete information you believe is incomplete.
The right to erasure – You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.
The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
The right to object to processing – You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
The right to data portability – You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.

section6.title: 6. Changes to This Privacy Policy
section6.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.

section7.title: 7. Contact Us
section7.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

sendDialog.answer: We have received your contact form and will get back to you as soon as possible.
